name: play
help:
Make the bot play song.
Usage: db!play [url/search term]

name: setpronouns
help:
Set your pronouns to people can check them with db!pronounscheck
Usage: db!setpronouns <pronouns> [--plural]
Examples of pronouns are:
they/them/their/theirs
she/her/her/hers
he/him/his/his
ze/zir/zir/zirs
xe/xir/xir/xirs

Use the --plural flag to mark your pronouns as plural (is vs are)

name: roleinfo
help:
Displays info about a specified role or the highest role that you have
Usage db!roleinfo [role]

name: loadingbar
help: Displays a progress bar that shows how much of the year has passed

name: achievement
help:
You got an achievement!
Usage: db!achievement <text>

name: setprefix
help:
Sets the new prefix
Usage: db!setprefix <prefix>

name: ship
help:
Ship 2 people
Usage: db!ship <@user> <@user>

name: discordmeme
help:
Gives you a discord meme
Usage: db!discordmeme

name: ban
help:
Bans a user from the guild (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: db!ban <@user> <Reason>

name: softban
help:
Kicks a user from the guild (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: db!softban <@user> [reason]

name: llama
help: Here is a llama

name: setwelcomechannel
help:
Sets the channel that displays the welcome and leave messages
Usage: db!setwelcomechannel <channel>
Aliases: db!setleavechannel

name: shorten
help:
Shortens a url
Usage: db!shorten <link to shorten>

name: thesearch
help:
Go on a journey to find intelligent life.
Usage: db!thesearch <message>

name: stats
help: Shows some nerdy stats about the bot

name: alpaca
help: Here is an alpaca

name: join
help: Makes the bot join the voice channel that you are in.

name: insta
help:
Get the latest picture of someones profile
Usage: db!insta <username>

name: shardinfo
help: Get information about all things shards

name: cookie
help:
db!cookie => blobnomcookie.
db!trigger => Use when you are triggered.
db!spam => What do you think üòè
db!wam => You need more WAM!.
db!mineh => HERE COMES MINEH!
db!invite => Gives you the bot invite
db!uptime => Shows the bot uptime
db!quote => Shows an inspiring quote
Aliases: db!trigger, db!spam, db!wam, db!mineh, db!invite, db!uptime, db!quote, db!xkcd, db!screenfetch

name: issue
help:
Reports heavy and weird issues to the developers.
This will create an invite to your server, so we can join and help you directly.
Those issues are hard to explain / resolve if we can't see nor read the chat or other things that happen.

name: scroll
help:
The scroll of truth
Usage: db!scroll <text>

name: changelog
help: shows the changelog on the bot

name: mute
help:
Mute a user.
Usage: db!mute <@user> <reason>

name: yoda
help:
Convert your sentences into yoda speak.
Usage: db!yoda <A sentence.>

name: announce
help:
Announces a message.
Usage db!announce <#channel> <message>

name: yesno
help:
Chooses between yes or no
Usage: db!yesno

name: kpop
help:
Gives you a random kpop member, command suggestion by Exa
Usage: db!kpop [search term]

name: stop
help: Stops the music player.

name: voicekick
help:
Kicks a user from the voice channel
Usage: db!voicekick <@user/voice channel>

name: dog
help: here is a dog.

name: togglefilterinvites
help:
Toggles if the bot should delete messages that contain invites
Usage: db!togglefilterinvites

name: flag
help:
Overlay your profile picture with a pride flag.
Usage: db!flag <flag/list> [username]

name: unlockemote
help:
Unlocks an emote if it was locked
Usage: db!unlockemote <:emote:>
Please note that you have to mention the emote due the bot not caching emotes for their names

name: clint
help:
Shows a picture of Clint staring at something on a monitor.
Usage: db!clint [image url]

name: ping
help: Shows the delay from the bot to the discord servers.

name: playrw
help:
Make the bot play song.
Usage: db!playrw [url/search term]

name: serverjoins
help:
Shows a graph with the joins for this server.
This is not a full history as it only looks at the members that are currently in the server.

name: save
help: Saves a playlist into a file with can be loaded with db!load

name: blur
help:
Overlays a blur filter to the provided image.
Usage: db!blur [image url]

name: delet
help:
Delet this
Usage: db!delet

name: skip
help:
Skips the current track.
Usage: db!skip [skip amount]

name: seek
help:
seek in the currently playing track
Usage: db!seek <minutes:seconds>
Examples: db!seek 04:20
db!seek 00:50

name: facts
help:
Show show the facts
Usage: db!facts <text>

name: toggleswearfilter
help:
Turns the swearword filter on or off
Usage: db!toggleswearfilter
Aliases: db!enableswearfilter, db!disableswearfilter

name: search
help:
Search for a song to play
Usage: db!search <search term>

name: unshorten
help:
Unshorten a short url
Usage: db!unshorten <short url>

name: saturate
help:
Overlays a darken filter to the provided image.
Usage: db!saturate [image url]

name: slowmode
help:
Enable slowmode on in the current channel.
Usage: db!slowmode <seconds (1-120)>
Use db!slowmode off to turn slowmode off

name: tempban
help:
Temporally bans a user from the guild (THIS WILL DELETE MESSAGES)
Usage: db!tempban <@user> <time><w/d/h/m/s> [Reason]

name: flip
help:
Flips a user.
Usage: db!flip [@user]

name: setdescription
help:
Set a custom description in db!guildinfo
Usage: db!setdescription <description>

name: salty
help:
Someones being salty today
Usage: db!salty [@user/url]

name: restart
help: Start the current track back to the beginning

name: togglekickmode
help:
Toggles whether we should kick or assign a role for spammers.
Usage: db!togglekickmode

name: blacklist
help:
Control the blacklisted words on your server
Note: People that have the kick members permission will bypass the blacklist

Usage:
db!blacklist list => Gives you a list of the current blacklisted words
db!blacklist clear => Clears the blacklist
db!blacklist add <word> => Adds a word to the blacklist
db!blacklist remove <word> => Removes a word from the blacklist

name: suggest
help: Suggest something to be in Dunctebot!

name: autorole
help:
Gives members a role when they join
Usage: db!autorole <role>

name: avatar
help:
Shows the avatar for a you or the specified user
Usage: db!avatar [@user]

name: reverse
help:
reverses a string
Usage: db!reverse <text>

name: joke
help:
See a funny joke. Dad's love them!
Usage: db!joke

name: csshumor
help: Gives you a funny css joke

name: token
help:
Tries to get as much info about a token as possible
Usage: db!token <token of a discord bot>

name: setleavemessage
help:
Sets the message that the bot shows when a member leaves
Usage: db!setleavemessage <leave message>

name: help
help:
Shows a list of all the commands.
Usage: db!help [command]

name: unban
help:
Unbans a user
Usage: db!unban <user>

name: vcautorole
help:
Gives a role to a user when they join a specified voice channel
Usage: db!vcautorole add <voice channel> <role>
db!vcautorole remove <voice channel>
db!vcautorole off
db!vcautorole list

name: unwarn
help:
Removes the latest warning of a user
Usage: db!unwarn <@user>

name: kick
help:
Kicks a user.
Usage: db!kick <@user> [reason]

name: 8ball
help:
Ask a question to the 8ball
Usage: db!8ball <question>

name: dehoist
help:
De-hoists a user
Usage: db!dehoist <@user>

name: shit
help: db!shit <message> => Exclaim that something is shit.db!pluralshit <message> => Exclaim that things are shit.

name: chat
help:
Have a chat with dunctebot
Usage: db!chat <message>

name: iwanttodie
help:
You have decided that you want to die
Usage: db!iwanttodie <text>

name: shuffle
help: Shuffles the current queue

name: setratelimits
help:
Sets our cooldown in minutes for un-muting your spammer of choice.
Usage: db!setratelimits <1|2|3|4|5|6>
Example: db!setratelimits 20|45|60|120|240|2400

name: translate
help:
Translate a text from English to another language
Usage: db!translate <destination language> <text>

name: radio
help:
Adds a radio http stream to your queue and goes to it!
Yes it skips all songs until it finds the stream it may bug if the current stream has the same url.
Usage: db!radio <(full)list/station name>

name: didyoumean
help:
Did you type your search wrong?
Usage: db!didyoumean <Top text>|<Bottom text>

name: captcha
help:
Checks if you are a robot
Usage: db!captcha <text>

name: leave
help: Makes the bot leave your channel.

name: birb
help: Here is a birb

name: tag
help:
Store it in a tag
Usage: db!tag <tag-name/raw/author/delete/create/help> [tag-name] [tag content]
The tags follow the same parsing as custom commands and the join/leave messages

name: drake
help:
Did you type your search wrong?
Usage: db!drake <Top text>|<Bottom text>

name: donate
help:
Help keeping the bot up by donating
Usage: db!donate [amount]

name: image
help:
Searches for an image on google
Usage: db!image <search term>

name: settings
help:
Shows the current settings
Usage: db!settings
Aliases: db!options

name: invert
help:
Overlays a invert filter to the provided image.
Usage: db!invert [image url]

name: purgechannel
help:
Purges a text channel.
Usage: db!purgechannel <#text-channel>

name: togglejoinmessage
help:
Turns the join message on or off
Usage: db!togglejoinmessage
Aliases: db!enablejoinmessage, db!disablejoinmessage

name: customcommand
help:
Create, run and delete custom commands
db!customcommand list => Shows a list of all the custom commands
db!customcommand new <name> <text> => Creates a new custom command
db!customcommand edit <name> <text> => Edits a custom command
db!customcommand raw <name> => Shows the raw value of a custom command
db!customcommand delete <name> => Deletes a custom command

name: list
help: shows the current queue

name: xkcd
help:
Sends the latest xkcd comic
Usage: db!xkcd [latest/random/number]

name: pause
help: Pauses the current song

name: volume
help:
Sets the new volume on the player.
Usage: db!volume [new volume]

name: warn
help:
Warns a member.
When a member has 3 warnings he/she will be kicked
Usage: db!warn <@user> [reason]

name: eval
help:
Evaluate java code on the bot
Usage: db!eval <java/groovy code>

name: cleanup
help:
Performs a cleanup in the channel where the command is run.
To clear an entire channel it's better to use db!purgechannel
Usage: db!cleanup [ammount] [keep-pinned] [bots-only]

name: pccheck
help:
WHoops get your pc checked
Usage: db!pccheck <reason>

name: forcedisconnect
help: Force disconnects the bot from music for when the bot is stuck

name: coin
help:
flips a coin.
Usage: db!coin

name: freerealestate
help:
It's free real estate
Usage: db!freerealestate <text>

name: roles
help: Returns a list of roles in the server

name: seal
help: Here is a nice seal

name: linus
help:
Shows a picture of Linus pointing to something on a monitor.
Usage: db!linus [image url]

name: delete
help:
Creates a Delete button.
Usage: db!delete <text>

name: deepfry
help:
Overlays a deepfry filter to the provided image.
Usage: db!deepfry [image url]

name: lockemote
help:
Lock an emote to some roles.
Usage: db!lockemote <emote> <@role...>
Please note that you can't use the emote anymore if you don't have any of the specified roles,
even if you have administrator permission

name: kitty
help: A alternative cat command with more kitties

name: dialog
help:
Gives you a nice dialog
Usage: db!}dialog <text>

name: kickme
help:
Kickes you off the server

name: blackandwhite
help:
Overlays a b&w filter to the provided image.
Usage: db!blackandwhite [image url]

name: load
help: Loads a given playlist file

name: setcolor
help:
Sets the colors of the embeds from the bot.
Usage: db!setcolor <hex color>
Aliases: db!setembedcolor

name: botinfo
help:
Gets some info about the bot
Usage: db!botinfo

name: tempmute
help:
Temporally mutes a user on the guild
Usage: db!tempmute <@user> <time><w/d/h/m/s> [Reason]

name: repeat
help:
Makes the player repeat the currently playing song
Use db!repeat playlist to repeat the current queue
Use db!repeat status for the current status

name: alpha
help: Ask Wolfram|Alpha all your geeky questions

name: unmute
help:
Unmutes a user if they are muted
Usage: db!unmute <@user>

name: lyrics
help: Shows the lyrics to the current song

name: userinfo
help:
Get information from yourself or from another user.
Usage: db!userinfo [username]

name: muterole
help:
Gives members a role when they spam.
Usage: db!muterole <role>
Aliases: db!spamrole

name: setjoinmessage
help:
Sets the message that the bot shows when a new member joins
Usage: db!setjoinmessage <join message>

help:
Convert your text to bricks
Usage: db!ttb <text>

name: nowplaying
help: Prints information about the currently playing song (title, current time)

name: jokeoverhead
help:
You just got wooshed
Usage: db!jokeoverhead [@user/url]

name: colour
help: Shows a random colour.

name: toggleannouncetracks
help:
Toggles if the player should announce the next playing track

name: toggleautodehoist
help:
Toggles if if the bot should auto de-hoist users
Usage: db!toggleautodehoist

name: urban
help:
Search the urban dictionary.
Usage: db!urban <search term>

name: pronounscheck
help:
Check someones pronouns.
Usage: db!pronounscheck [user]
Pronouns can be set via db!setpronouns

help:
db!lewdneko => Gives a very lewd neko
db!carsandhentai => Delet this
db!lewdkitsune => Shows you a lewd kitsune
db!hentai => Just some hentai

name: togglespamfilter
help:
Toggles whether we should handle your incoming spam.
Usage: db!togglespamfilter

name: pplay
help: Add a playlist to the queue.

name: hug
help:
db!hug => Hug a user
db!lewd => When things get to lewd
db!pat => Pat a user
db!punch => Punch a user in their face
db!shrug => ¬Ø\_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø
db!lick => Lick a user
db!owo => OwO what's this
db!weeb <category> => Gives you a random image from weeb.sh with that type

name: readd
help: Readd the current track to the end of the queue

name: hackban
help:
Ban a user before he/she can join your guild.
Usage: db!hackban <userId...>

name: setlogchannel

Sets the channel to log messages in
Usage: db!setlogchannel <text channel>

name: testtag
help:
Test your jagtag format before you save it as custom command etc.

name: guildinfo
help: Show some stats
